content.text:
The SPInfo table is defined in [2], and Table 18 defines the Preconfiguration Data for the SPInfo table.

[Table: table_35_463]

As specified in [2], a TPer SHALL ignore the value of SPSessionTimeout column if:
a) no value exists in SPSessionTimeout column; or 
b) SPSessionTimeout column is zero.

tables.table_md:
| UID | SPID | Name | Size | SizeInUse | SPSessionTimeout | Enabled | |---|---|---|---|---|---|---| | 00 00 00 02
00 00 00 01 | 00 00 02 05
00 00 00 01 | "Admin" | | | | T |
